data.lyric:
[ti:Done]
[ar:Chris Janson]
[al:Done]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Done - Chris Janson
[00:06.34]Lyrics by：Chris Janson/Jamie Paulin/Matt Roy/Mitch Oglesby
[00:12.68]Done
[00:14.96]The first time I saw you done
[00:19.42]Like the first dance was through I was done
[00:23.94]That one kiss I knew
[00:25.99]There was nothing I wouldn't do
[00:28.87]Just to give you
[00:30.72]That house on a hill with a four-plank around it
[00:35.51]Every last breath till the last star is counted
[00:40.20]Just say the word girl paint me you're perfect
[00:44.75]I won't quit till the good Lord says my work is done
[00:50.33]Like a faded out song on the radio done
[00:54.71]Like the cowboy gets the girl when the curtains roll
[00:58.31]I'll give you a lifetime of days in the sun
[01:02.74]Whatever you need and you want I won't stop till it's done
[01:12.01]Done
[01:14.02]All the hell I was raising done
[01:18.65]All the careless heartbreaking done
[01:23.14]For the chance that you'll taken
[01:25.68]I spend my nights praying
[01:28.10]And all my days chasing
[01:30.38]That house on a hill with a four-plank around it
[01:34.96]Every last breath till the last star is counted
[01:39.65]Just say the word girl paint me you're perfect
[01:44.19]I won't quit till the good Lord says my work is done
[01:49.82]Like a faded out song on the radio done
[01:54.15]Like the cowboy gets the girl when the curtains roll
[01:57.64]I'll give you a lifetime of days in the sun
[02:02.21]Whatever you need and you want I won't stop till it's done
[02:13.78]You know I won't stop till it's done
[02:17.77]You need a man you can lean on done
[02:22.24]You need some faith you can hang your dreams on
[02:27.28]Check 'em off one by one
[02:31.91]In that house on a hill with a four-plank around it
[02:36.81]Every last breath till the last star is counted
[02:41.37]Just say the word girl paint me you're perfect
[02:45.91]I won't quit till the good Lord says my work is done
[02:51.49]Like a faded out song on the radio done
[02:55.79]Like the cowboy gets the girl when the curtains roll
[02:59.35]I'll give you a lifetime of days in the sun
[03:03.89]Whatever you need and you want I won't stop till it's done
[03:10.81]Baby I won't stop till it's done
[03:15.54]Oh you know I ain't done
[03:20.78]First time I saw you done
data.trans:
[ti:Done]
[ar:Chris Janson]
[al:Done]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.34]//
[00:12.68]沉醉
[00:14.96]第一次见到你 就为你沉醉
[00:19.42]第一支舞跳完之后 我就被你俘获了
[00:23.94]那个吻多么甜蜜
[00:25.99]我愿意做任何事情
[00:28.87]只想给你
[00:30.72]山上那座围了四面篱笆的房子
[00:35.51]每一次呼吸都是为你 直到地老天荒
[00:40.20]说你愿意 姑娘 你简直完美无瑕
[00:44.75]我不会退却 除非上帝说我完成了使命
[00:50.33]就像电台上渐渐模糊的歌声 我为你沉醉
[00:54.71]就像牛仔终于得到了心爱的姑娘
[00:58.31]我会把一生都奉献给你
[01:02.74]不管你需要什么 想要什么 我会不顾一切让你得到
[01:12.01]不再放纵
[01:14.02]我曾经玩世不恭 如今不再放纵
[01:18.65]曾经淡漠粗心 让人心碎 如今不再放纵
[01:23.14]只希望你能为我冒险一次
[01:25.68]我在夜里祈祷
[01:28.10]在白天追寻
[01:30.38]山上那座围了四面篱笆的房子
[01:34.96]每一次呼吸都是为你 直到地老天荒
[01:39.65]说你愿意 姑娘 你简直完美无瑕
[01:44.19]我不会退却 除非上帝说我完成了使命
[01:49.82]就像电台上渐渐模糊的歌声 我为你沉醉
[01:54.15]就像牛仔终于得到了心爱的姑娘
[01:57.64]我会把一生都奉献给你
[02:02.21]不管你需要什么 想要什么 我会不顾一切让你得到
[02:13.78]你知道 我不会止步 除非将你得到
[02:17.77]你需要一个可以依靠的男人
[02:22.24]你需要一点信念 追寻你的梦想
[02:27.28]将它们一个一个地实现
[02:31.91]在山丘上那座围了四面篱笆的房子里
[02:36.81]每一次呼吸都是为你 直到地老天荒
[02:41.37]说你愿意 姑娘 你简直完美无瑕
[02:45.91]我不会退却 除非上帝说我完成了使命
[02:51.49]就像电台上渐渐模糊的歌声 我为你沉醉
[02:55.79]就像牛仔终于得到了心爱的姑娘
[02:59.35]我会把一生都奉献给你
[03:03.89]不管你需要什么 想要什么 我会不顾一切让你得到
[03:10.81]宝贝 我不会止步 除非将你得到
[03:15.54]你知道 我没有放弃
[03:20.78]第一次见到你 我就为你沉醉
